name: Beyond The Sea (Liminal Dreams Series)
description:
THIS IS THE SECOND GAME IN A SERIES CALLED THE "LIMINAL DREAMS SERIES", WICH HAS A HIDDEN STORY, AND EACH GAME IN THIS SERIES IS A PUZZLE PIECE TO UNDERSTANDING THAT STORY.

Beyond The Sea is a walking simulator where you have to cross the sea on foot.

Made with Godot 3.4.2

CONTROLS :

- DIRECTIONAL ARROWS/WASD KEYS : Walk

- SPACE/ENTER : Interact

- ESCAPE : Show Mouse
